uk.co.benashwell.CartoonDrawing

Class Picture

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.benashwell.CartoonDrawing.Picture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Image, TextBubble

    public class Picture
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.image.ImageObserver
    A class to hold the image location and file name, also holds the methods to draw each picture.
    Author:
    Ben Ashwell, Martin Key, Abel Toro
